Keri Mallari

I am a PhD student in the Human Centered Design and Engineering at the University of Washington.
I currently work with Gary Hsieh in the Prosocial Computing Lab. I received my undergraduate degree in Math and Computer Science from CUNY Lehman College, where I received a four-year merit scholarship from the Macaulay Honors College.
